description: Number of minimal covers of an (n+1)-set by a collection of n nonempty subsets, A035348(n,n-1).
comments: A cover of a set S is a collection of nonempty subsets of S whose union is S. A cover of S is called minimal if none of its proper subsets covers S. [from the Hearne/Wagner reference]Partial sums of A053221.
references: Hearne and Wagner, Minimal covers of finite sets, Discr. Math. 5 (1973), 247-251.
